channel.title: MyBB RuneScape Forum Avatar BBCode Plugin
channel.description:
After making the Xbox live avatar one I thought that this would be a good idea. This one is a bit confusing to use but in the read me I have explained it pretty well.
How To Use:
[code] [head]HEADID[/head] [/code]
Preview:
[img]http://gyazo.com/b6ec79f22dba7957e84458d76a995a78.png?1365890088[/img]
[url=http://rspsdesigns.com/downloads.php?download=4]Download[/url]
